stimulusHtml: Find the total distance that the rover travels over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaaIWa GaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaigdaaeaaaaaa@3BD5@ .

features.html:
A pla netary rover travels on a flat surface. The path of the rover for the time interval  0 ≤ t ≤ 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGimaiabgs MiJkaadshacqGHKjYOcaaIYaaaaa@3BCF@ hours is shown in the rectangular coordinate system above. The rover starts at the point with coordinates (6,5) at time t = 0. The coordinates (x(t), y(t)) of the position of the rover change at rates given by

  x ′ ( t ) = − 12 sin ( 2 t 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGabmiEayaafa GaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0IaaGymaiaaikdaciGG ZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaGGOaGaaGOmaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaik daaaGccaGGPaaaaa@4394@

y ′ ( t ) = 10 cos ( 1 + t ) , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGabmyEayaafa GaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaaGymaiaaicdaciGGJbGaai4B aiaacohacaGGOaGaaGymaiabgUcaRmaakaaabaGaamiDaaWcbeaaki aacMcacaGGSaaaaa@4364@

where x(t) and y(t) are measured in meters and t is measured in hours.
